definition.text: Most Bots in Superalgos are not awake all the time. As a strategy to preserve hardware resourses, they run and go to sleep for a configurable amount of time, or until they are woken up by the finishing of some other task they are waiting for. Each cycle of running and sleeping is a loop at the Main Loop of a Bot.
